[02-Jun-2025 11:51:54 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_bsf_staff_services ( `id` INT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `staff_id` INT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `service_id` INT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `price` DOUBLE NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, UNIQUE KEY unique_ids (staff_id, service_id), CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (staff_id) REFERENCES wp_bsf_staff(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES wp_bsf_services(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE = INNODB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
